title: "appendix A"
output: 
        pdf_document

```{r, echo=F, message=F, warning=FALSE, results="asis"}
library(here)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
setwd(here("tables"))
key <- read_excel("appendix key.xlsx")
key$Domain<-ifelse(is.na(key$Domain), " ", key$Domain)
# key <- sub("\n", "",key$Item)
# strsplit(key$Item, "\n", fixed=T)
mutate_all(key,linebreak) %>% 
  kable(booktabs = T, escape = F, longtable=T, align="l", 
        linesep = '\\addlinespace', caption="Items of the new measure and their corresponding facets and domains")%>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = "repeat_header")
```
